name: Rover Rescue
description: Three ships, ten planets, thousands of people in danger and millions of meteors between them and you. Rescue as many as possible in a race across the whole solar system and make off with as much salvage as you can in this fun & frantic little home-made sci-fi action-strategy game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: at least 2Ghz quad core or 2.5Ghz dual core Graphics: 512 Mb dedicated video ram or better, ATi or NVidia DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game was adapted from tablet to PC. The graphics, controls and interface are ok, but I wouldn't recommend the game itself: all you have to do is drag an endless number of lines and loops to guide the rovers. And the 'soundtrack' (if one could name it as such) is repetitive, even annoying.  So, unless you miss playing on your tablet, find something else.
The other negative reviews really aren't exaggerating. This is a mobile title at best. Got it as part of a bundle so it was essentially free but still.... no.  I regret even installing it.
